headline.print_headline: Venezuela Battles Obesity Amid Dearth of Good Food
headline.main: Venezuela Battles Obesity Amid Dearth of Good Food

docs.lead_paragraph: Venezuela's socialist government is sounding the alarm about growing waistlines in a country where record food shortages are making it harder to put healthy meals on the table, prompting many people to fill up on empty calories.
docs.snippet: Venezuela's socialist government is sounding the alarm about growing waistlines in a country where record food shortages are making it harder to put healthy meals on the table, prompting many people to fill up on empty calories.

docs.abstract: Mark Bittman Op-Ed column examines cultural attitudes toward drinking, and disputes notion that anyone drinks alcohol moderately for health benefits; notes discrepancy in way drinking alcohol and eating food are treated by health community, as dangers of alcohol are widely known and warned against, whereas dangers of bad diets are not.
docs.lead_paragraph: We fear alcohol’s bad effects too much, and those of food too little.
docs.snippet: We fear alcohol’s bad effects too much, and those of food too little.

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
keywords.name: organizations

headline.print_headline: Pediatricians' Rx for Schools: Later Start Times
headline.main: Pediatricians' Rx for Schools: Later Start Times

docs.lead_paragraph: Pediatricians have a new prescription for schools: later start times for teens.
docs.snippet: Pediatricians have a new prescription for schools: later start times for teens.

docs.abstract: Philanthropic ambitions of former New York City mayor Michael Bloomberg have grown to a global scale as he pursues pledge to give away his $32.8 billion fortune before he dies; with programs in 95 countries, Bloomberg Philanthropies has set lofty objectives, like reducing smoking rates in tobacco-loving Turkey among several other initiatives.
docs.lead_paragraph: Stepping up his philanthropy, the former mayor of New York still pushes big ideas, but on a much wider stage. Turkey’s smoking rate is just one of his targets.
docs.snippet: Stepping up his philanthropy, the former mayor of New York still pushes big ideas, but on a much wider stage. Turkey’s smoking rate is just one of his targets.

headline.print_headline: Thousands March in New York City to Protest Police Chokehold Death
headline.main: Thousands March in New York City to Protest Police Chokehold Death

docs.lead_paragraph: The Reverend Al Sharpton led thousands of chanting but peaceful activists in a march across Staten Island on Saturday to protest the death of Eric Garner, who died after New York City police put him in a banned chokehold last month.
docs.snippet: The Reverend Al Sharpton led thousands of chanting but peaceful activists in a march across Staten Island on Saturday to protest the death of Eric Garner, who died after New York City police put him in a banned chokehold last month.
